title: Technigod
author: Technigod
content: Greetings,I am a native English technical analysis writer and I'm offering my services to news channels/trading groups/media outlets and the like.I have two years experience trading and have a success rate north of 60%. I'm well versed with most of the trading strategies and practices utilised in the markets today but focus mainly on supply and demand smart money trading. I believe it has potential for a much higher risk:reward ratio and the zones can be easily identified to see the big money moves.My motive to offering such a service is because I have some time to fill since I recently let go of some responsibilities and I would like to find and form a few beneficial relationships.Over time I have built experience charting the following market sectors: - Crypto - Forex - Indices - Commodities - StocksTrading Skills: - Deep understanding of the Cryptocurrency landscape since 2012. - Familiarity with classic/harmonic trading patterns and systems. - Keen insight to price action trading and methodologies. - Knowledge on a multitude of trading indicators and scripts. - Integral understanding of risk management systems and strategies for any account size/trading style. - Moderate knowledge of on-chain data and metrics used in scoping aggregate economical data. - Inter-market analysis (Investigating polarities and inversely correlated data across markets).TradingView is my go-to technical analysis charting software, it should be yours too!Additionally, I can provide trading signals on the basis that we have a long-term agreement. I will not be forecasting over the short-term but will happily work with a channel/group consistently.Since I am new on here I'm looking to work for the first few clients for absolutely FREE!Get in touch over on Telegram: @Technigod

comments.author: Technigod
comments.body: Update: Answered a couple of your questions over Telegram and I just want to clarify that I am able to provide rewriting or transcription services past what is already mentioned in the OP.Thanks for your time.
